title: Samsung Innovation Campus certifies 2,000 youth in Karnataka
description: Samsung Innovation Campus certifies 2,000 students in Bengaluru, enhancing skills in Artificial Intelligence and Coding for future employability.
content:
Samsung, global consumer electronics brand, on Thursday said it certified 2,000 students in Bengaluru under its flagship Samsung Innovation Campus (SIC) programme, as part of the company’s efforts to build a future-ready talent pool in Karnataka.

title: Centropy PR appointed to lead UKAI trade association comms
description: UKAI has strengthened its public voice and international reach by appointing global communications firm Centropy PR as its official agency of record, marking a strategic step in how the organisation will engage with policymakers, industry leaders and the wider tech ecosystem as artificial intelligence continues to reshape the UK’s digital economy.

title: AI Trends Shaping Tech Innovation in 2026
description: By 2026, artificial intelligence will transform tech leadership by potentially saving tech leaders countless hours and significant financial resources. title: Rio Tinto and Glencore Abandon Merger, $260bn Mining Tita...
description: Rio Tinto and Glencore abandon merger plans that once promised to forge a $260 billion mining behemoth, ending months of high-stakes negotiations amid an industrywide scramble for copper and other metals powering the artificial intelligence boom. title: Gen Z struggle to make friends with people who have ‘different views’
description: Sixteen to 24-year-olds also have concerns about the rise of artificial intelligence, deepfakes and privacy issues, according to a survey by the BBC
content:
The BBC reached a low of two thirds of young people each week last year, down from 80 per cent in 2021, as they turn to rival platforms including YouTube and premium streaming services.
